00070 class vtPlantSpecies {
00071 public:
00072     vtPlantSpecies();
00073     virtual ~vtPlantSpecies();
00074 
00075     // copy
00076     vtPlantSpecies &operator=(const vtPlantSpecies &v);
00077 
00078     void SetSpecieID(short SpecieID) { m_iSpecieID = SpecieID; }
00079     short GetSpecieID() const { return m_iSpecieID; }
00080 
00081     void SetCommonName(const char *CommonName);
00082     const char *GetCommonName() const { return m_szCommonName; }
00083 
00084     void SetSciName(const char *SciName);
00085     const char *GetSciName() const { return m_szSciName; }
00086 
00087     void SetMaxHeight(float f) { m_fMaxHeight = f; }
00088     float GetMaxHeight() const { return m_fMaxHeight; }
00089 
00090     virtual void AddAppearance(bool billboard, const char *filename,
00091         float width, float height, float shadow_radius, float shadow_darkness)
00092     {
00093         vtPlantAppearance *pApp = new vtPlantAppearance(billboard, filename,
00094             width, height, shadow_radius, shadow_darkness);
00095         m_Apps.Append(pApp);
00096     }
00097 
00098     int NumAppearances() const { return m_Apps.GetSize(); }
00099     vtPlantAppearance *GetAppearance(int i) const { return m_Apps[i]; }
00100 
00101 protected:
00102     short       m_iSpecieID;
00103     vtString    m_szCommonName;
00104     vtString    m_szSciName;
00105     float       m_fMaxHeight;
00106     Array<vtPlantAppearance*> m_Apps;
00107 };

00121     vtPlantSpecies *GetSpecies(int i) const
00122     {
00123         if (i >= 0 && i < m_Species.GetSize())
00124             return m_Species[i];
00125         else
00126             return NULL;
00127     }

00129     virtual void AddSpecies(int SpecieID, const char *common_name,
00130         const char *SciName, float max_height);
00131 
00132 protected:
